DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the effect of synovectomy on clinical outcomes of arthroscopic rotator cuff repair.
DOC.brief_title: Arthroscopic Rotator Cuff Repair With Synovectomy
DOC.criteria: Patients with a fullthickness rotator cuff tear undergoing arthroscopic rotator cuff repair History of shoulder surgery History of acute traumatic shoulder Chronic dislocation Pyogenic infection Rotator cuff arthropathy with glenohumeral osteoarthritis and superior migration of the humeral head Isolated subscapularis tear Psychiatric problems that precluded informed consent An inability to read or write Other serious issues that precluded participation in the study Open surgery Rotator cuff tear with worker's compensation claim Refuse to participate in the study Subjects who, for any reason, are judged by the investigator to be inappropriate for this study, including a subject who had other severe medical condition or laboratory abnormality, or who is unable to communicate or to cooperate with the investigator
